attributes.action: 1% National Salary Sacrifice to fund Health Workers Pay Rise
attributes.additional_details:
This government sponsored 100% of this Salary Sacrafice will be used to provide a substantial pay rise to all Front Line NHS Nursing Staff.

If needed Employers could be asked to Opt in to this scheme with the govenment highlighting the businesses taking part and more importantly those who have opted out.
attributes.background: Govenment to announce a national 1% salary sacrifice to all Salaries greater than £40,000 to support a substantial Pay rise to Front Line Heath Care Nursing staff. This Salary Sacraficeshould increase to 2% for Salaries greater than £80,000 including all members of Parliament.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Increase income tax/NI to give NHS staff a larger pay increase
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578466

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Increase NHS pay by increasing higher rates of income tax.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578150
